page.title: 11Farming in Beckermet
page.content: Barley is the most widespread crop grown in this area. Wheat is also quite a common crop.Potatoes are the most widely grown vegetable crop.Other vegetable crops are turnips, cabbage and carrots. Silage is made from cut grass and is left out for a day in rows.It is picked up, taken by trailers then tipped and moved into a building where it is rolled.A black plastic sheet is put over it to prevent the air rotting it. The main breeds of cattle are Friesian,Holstein,Hereford,Charolais. Most of the sheep are Herdwicks. The farm animals may suffer from several illnesses which need treated by the local veterinary surgeon.Displaced stomachs affects cows as does pneumonia and milk fever as well as inflammation of the milk bag which is known as mastitis.
